message.title: Welcome to the BugTracker virtual tour
message.text: Use ICON_NEXT to go forward and ICON_PREV to visit previous slides. You can exit this tour anytime by pressing ICON_EXIT

message.title: LOGO_SMALL BugTracker
message.text: BugTracker is a tool to help developers keep track of bugs. It features a project based approach to bug tracking

tooltip.title: The Navbar
tooltip.text: Most everything is accessible from some link in the navbar. It will always be at the top of the page so you'll know where to go if you get lost!

tooltip.title: Projects Page
tooltip.text: This link will take you to the directory of all public projects

tooltip.title: Project Previews
tooltip.text: You can view a brief summary of a project by looking at its preview

tooltip.title: Project Searching
tooltip.text: BugTracker allows for keyword search of all public projects on the site

message.title: Project Page
message.text: Each project has its own dedicated page sharing pertinent information

tooltip.title: Joining Projects
tooltip.text: You can join an public projects by pressing this button. Don't worry you can leave a project at any time

tooltip.title: Tech Stack
tooltip.text: You can display any languages or tools that you use in your project. This can be helpful for finding users with skills in those languages or tools

tooltip.title: ICON_USER Members
tooltip.text: Projects can have any amount of members in them. Only project members can make and comment on bugs

tooltip.title: ICON_BUG Bugs
tooltip.text: Projects can have also any amount of bugs in them. Each bug is given a unique number to identify it

tooltip.title: Bug Previews
tooltip.text: You can view a brief summary of a bug by looking at its preview

tooltip.title: Search Bugs
tooltip.text: Just like projects, bugs also allow for keyword search

message.title: Bug Page
message.text: Each bug has its own dedicated page containing a description  and status of the bug

tooltip.title: Favorite Bugs
tooltip.text: You can favorite a bug to keep track of it easier

tooltip.title: ICON_DANGER Fix Bugs
tooltip.text: Once you have figured out what the problem is, you can upgrade the bug from unfixed to review stage

tooltip.title: ICON_WARNING Review Stage
tooltip.text: Putting a bug in review stage means that it is ready to be tested

tooltip.title: ICON_SUCCESS Fixed Stage
tooltip.text: When you are sure that you have fixed the bug you can upgrade it to fixed stage

tooltip.title: Comment
tooltip.text: If you are a member of the project then you can discuss the bug with other members through comments

tooltip.title: ICON_USER Collaborate
tooltip.text: Talk to other members about potential causes and solutions for the bug

tooltip.title: Sidebar
tooltip.text: The sidebar has many useful links. Click the hamburger icon to open it

tooltip.title: ICON_USER Visit Your Profile
tooltip.text: Every user has a profile

message.title: Your Profile
message.text: This is your profile and allows you to be found by other users

tooltip.title: Invite to Projects
tooltip.text: You can invite users to your projects with this button

tooltip.title: ICON_CAL Visit Your Dashboard
tooltip.text: Each user has a dashboard

message.title: Your Dashboard
message.text: Your dashboard gives suggestions on what pages to visit

tooltip.title: Recently Favorited
tooltip.text: You can view your most recent favorited bugs and access them easily

tooltip.title: Recently Joined
tooltip.text: You can also view you most recently joined projects to access them easily

tooltip.title: ICON_BIN Joined Projects
tooltip.text: You can view all of your joined projects here

tooltip.title: ICON_NEW New Project
tooltip.text: You can create a new project here

message.title: Creating Projects
message.text: Users can create any amount of projects

tooltip.title: Private Project Support
tooltip.text: With private enabled, only you and members can view the project page. You will have to invite users manually for them to join

tooltip.title: ICON_BUG Favorited Bugs
tooltip.text: Click to view all of your favorited bugs. You can also unfavorite any bugs here

tooltip.title: ICON_MAIL Project Invites
tooltip.text: You can view all of your project invites here. Invites dont expire

tooltip.title: ICON_NEW_USER View other Users
tooltip.text: You can search other users here

message.title: That concludes the BugTracker virtual tour
message.text: Thank you for touring this project. Press BUTTON_HOME to return to the main page
